text: demolishing sophistriesA sophistry is a false argument that is presented in such a way as to appear correct, and impressive, especially if not properly analyzed. Satan has purveyed a number of sophistries designed to keep people from the knowledge of God, such as humanism, relativism, materialism, Freudianism, and so on. and every arrogance that sets itself up against the knowledge of God; taking captive every thought to make it obedient to Christ;
